title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 1 point:

1 point is earned for the answer

P'(0) = B(0) - D(0) = 1000 - 250 = 750 penguins per year
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following point:

1 point is earned for the answer

P'(0) = B(0) - D(0) = 1000 - 250 = 750 penguins per year

The response earns all of the following point:

1 point is earned for the answer

P'(0) = B(0) - D(0) = 1000 - 250 = 750 penguins per year

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 2 points:

1 point is earned for correct limits

1 point is earned for the integrand

1 point is earned for answer

P(40) = 100000 + ∫ 0 40 (B(t)−D(t)) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@456F@

= 100000 + 33057.56459

There are 133,058 penguins on the island.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The response can earn up to 1 point:

1 point is earned for the answer

1 40 ∫ 0 40 (B(t)−D(t)) dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@47B2@ = 826.439

OR

P ( 40 ) − P ( 0 ) 40 − 0 = 133058 − 100000 40 = 826.45

The average rate of change is 826 penguins per year.

title: Part D
